label: Upper Back
short_description: Load sits on the traps. Both hands are required to stabilize. SQUAT_REGULAR home base.

label: Front Rack
short_description: Bar rests on the anterior deltoids. Forces upright posture, shifting load to quads and upper back. SQUAT_FRONT home base.

label: Front (Held)
short_description: Goblet/Zercher style. Hands are actively holding the weight against the chest.

label: Front (Extended)
short_description: Counterbalance hold. Massive anterior core demand. Perfect secondary load for Belt Squats.

label: Waist / Hips
short_description: Belt Squat. Removes axial spinal loading. Hands are free, allowing secondary loads.

label: Torso (Vest)
short_description: Weighted vest. Adds mass without occupying hands. Can be primary or secondary.

label: Sides (Hands)
short_description: Farmer's carry style. Hands are occupied. Lowers center of gravity.

label: Overhead
short_description: Locked out overhead. Requires full body coordination. Cannot safely mix with other placements.

label: Leg-Isolated
short_description: Leg Press/Hack Squat machine. The machine supports the weight entirely.
